Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsthis is the very short version of this particular experience out of many. i was sitting on a picnic bench to the north this time waiting to see a ufo again. you could hear a very large helicopter over the east ridge, but never saw it. shortly after, at about 1832 as i looked up to south, there it was a very bright white star like object. i have seen this before on numerous occasions. it moved in closer towards me and hovered. we looked at each other for a bit, and then it started to back up slowly and then started to flash colors of red, orange, yellow and white. in my binoculars it looks like a bunch of lights, and no real shape to it. it appeared as though alot of big diamonds were being shone upon and it created intense light play. beautiful colors. it began moving to the south towards the small ridge behind the boyscout camp and headed directly into the trees towards the top. as i watched it with the binoculars, it flew directly into the top of the ridge in the trees. as it did, there were spinning lights then it diappeared. i did document this sighting with videos and pictures. there are amazing things that were caught that my human eye did not catch. the second ufo i would see inside of my truck upon my return from this sighting. i caught an orange orb\round object ufo way out towards the west over the ocean at the edge of the sandbar. at least 1\2 mile out. it became more intense white and orange as it moved very slowly over the ocean. it would bob around, and then just stop and hover off and on. during this time the geese were screaming like something was choking them to death. i have never heard geese make this noise in my 42 years living in alaska. this object started to move faster and the same color of lights and sequence it portrayed as the last ufo sighting only moments before. it headed south towards the same area where the other ufo flew directly into the ridge. however, this one just disappeared over the river before the ridge. i hung out for a bit longer then headed home about 1930ish.
Summary: Observed very white star like ufo...hover, move, take off on usual path. Flashing colors then headed directly into trees on top of ridge. could see lights spiraling and flashing then disappeared.
